summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 30th Avenue Southwest, from Avalon Way to the north line of Read's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7117, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
